description: T1 (Eucalyptus tree)-  Fell. T2 (Pine Tree)- Fell. Replant four new trees (summary)
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
decision_conditions: The description of works for this Notification includes replacement of the tree(s) to be removed and this decision is mindful of and influenced by this. In this instance, the Council will require the tree[s] to be replaced. The position of the tree[s] need not be identical to that of those removed but should be in the rear garden. The following species are recommended: Betula spp., Sorbus spp. The planting shall be undertaken in the first planting season [November to March] or part thereof following the commencement of works on site as agreed under the work to trees application. The Local Planning Authority shall also be informed in writing once the replacement tree[s] has [have] been planted. Failure to comply with this statutory requirement may result in the issue of a 'Tree Replacement Notice' under section 207 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990.
